ygData.subject: Re: Camping
ygData.msgSnippet: It means no dual use of rare items....which is fine with me. I d like to have two tommies but I would be willing to not have two of them if it helped fix the
ygData.messageBody:
It means no dual use of rare items....which is fine with me. I'd like to
have two tommies but I would be willing to not have two of them if it helped
fix the camping problem


-----Original Message-----
From: Jynxx <Jynxx@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Camping


>From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>

>No, if you make all valuable items Lore Items, you can only have one. What

>Not to mention bracers and stuff.

>Tyveris
